title: TAKING OFFERS -- 1 T card, 1 E card 1 Notebook card 1 Diamond Star plus extra!!

posts.post_title: TAKING OFFERS -- 1 T card, 1 E card 1 Notebook card 1 Diamond Star plus extra!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
Tried this 2 weeks ago and it worked well. So I'll do it gain. 



Lot of:



T205 McGraw-miscut top to bottom, not trimmed, no creasing.



T207 Schardt-very tough common, has a crease and back damage from album storage



Notebook card of Frank Chance-very nice well cut out, no creases



Diamond Stars # 24 Sparky Adams-last card in the tougher 1-24 first series of 1934 PSA 6



I am also throwing in a 1920's Helmar box, a Babe Ruth medallion and a Wagner Henry Reccius copy.



$250 for the lot, delivered. 1st to say I'll take it.



Scott
